ContainerDataObject Class Reference

ContainerDataObject is the abstract super class for all lists and complex objects in the Approxsim xml schema except ValueType descendants. More...

#include <DataObjectImpl.h>

 Registers this ContainerDataObject and all its children with the Mapper.

Protected Attributes

std::vector< DataObject * > mObjects
 A vector with the children of this container. The order of the children is the same as in the xml schema.

std::map< std::string, DataObject * > mObjectMap
 Maps a child's identifier to the child itself.

Detailed Description

ContainerDataObject is the abstract super class for all lists and complex objects in the Approxsim xml schema except ValueType descendants.
